cute aggression

cute aggression make music. music that you like. or don’t. to cute aggression that doesn’t matter. come by when cute aggression play a concert. they play synthesizers and drum machines and guitars and stuff. or maybe they don’t. maybe they just play with your expectations.

currently recording our first album.

XOXO
